column2: set_2 as ( select c.employee_id from (select employee_id from set_1 )b join ( select employee_id
column3: manager_id from employees )c on b.employee_id = c.manager_id ) select d.employee_id from ( select employee_id from set_2 ) e join ( select employee_id
column4: manager_id from employees )d on d.manager_id = e.employee_id union all select employee_id from set_2 union all select employee_id from set_1

column1: with t as (select e1.employee_id
column3: e2.employee_id as manager from employees e1 join employees e2 on e1.manager_id=e2.employee_id where e1.employee_id!=1 ) select distinct employee_id as EMPLOYEE_ID from t where manager=1 union select distinct employee_id from t where manager in (select distinct employee_id from t where manager in (select distinct employee_id from t where manager=1)) union select distinct employee_id from t where manager in (select distinct employee_id from t where manager=1)

column1: with t as (select e1.employee_id
column3: e2.employee_id as manager from employees e1 join employees e2 on e1.manager_id=e2.employee_id where e1.employee_id!=1 ) select distinct employee_id as EMPLOYEE_ID from t where manager=1 union select distinct employee_id from t where manager in (select distinct employee_id from t where manager=1) union select distinct employee_id from t where manager in (select distinct employee_id from t where manager in (select distinct employee_id from t where manager=1))

column1: with temp as ( select e0.employee_id
column2: ((case when e1.employee_id = 1 then 1 else 0 end) + (case when e2.employee_id = 1 then 1 else 0 end) + (case when e3.employee_id = 1 then 1 else 0 end)) as is_head from Employees e0 left join Employees e1 on e0.manager_id = e1.employee_id left join Employees e2 on e1.manager_id = e2.employee_id left join Employees e3 on e2.manager_id = e3.employee_id where e0.employee_id <> e0.manager_id or e1.employee_id <> e1.manager_id or e2.employee_id <> e2.manager_id ) select employee_id from temp where is_head > 0

column1: with temp as (select e1.employee_id
column3: e1.manager_id
column4: e2.manager_id as indirect_boss_1 from employees e1 join employees e2 on e1.manager_id = e2.employee_id)
column6: e3.manager_id as final_boss from temp t join employees e3 on e3.employee_id = t.indirect_boss_1) select distinct employee_id from temp2 where final_boss = 1 and employee_id != 1

column1: with temp as (select employee_id from Employees where manager_id = 1 and employee_id <> 1 )
column2: tmp_1 as (select employee_id from Employees where manager_id in (select employee_id from temp))
column3: tmp_2 as (select employee_id from Employees where manager_id in (select employee_id from tmp_1)) select employee_id from temp union all select employee_id from tmp_1 union all select employee_id from tmp_2

column1: with tmp1 as (select * from Employees where manager_id = 1 and employee_id <> 1)
column3: t2.employee_name
column4: t1.employee_id as manager_id from tmp1 t1 inner join Employees t2 on t1.employee_id = t2.manager_id)
column7: t1.employee_id as manager_id from tmp2 t1 inner join Employees t2 on t1.employee_id = t2.manager_id) select distinct employee_id from tmp1 union all select distinct employee_id from tmp2 union all select distinct employee_id from tmp3 order by 1

column1: with zte as (Select E1.manager_id
column3: E3.employee_id as thirdEmp
column4: E4.employee_id as forEmp from Employees E1 left join Employees E2 on E2.manager_id = E1.employee_id left join Employees E3 on E3.manager_id = E2.employee_id left join Employees E4 on E4.manager_id = E3.employee_id where E1.manager_id = 1) select * from (select secEmp as EMPLOYEE_ID from zte union select thirdEmp from zte union select forEmp from zte) temp where EMPLOYEE_ID <> 1 and EMPLOYEE_ID is not null
